plot: Only she knows what happened.Only I can make her speak.I love him so totally, completely, sometimes it threatens to overwhelm me. Sometimes I think-No. I won't write about that.ALICIAAlicia Berenson writes a diary as a release, an outlet - and to prove to her beloved husband that everything is fine. She can't bear the thought of worrying Gabriel, or causing him pain.Until, late one evening, Alicia shoots Gabriel five times and then never speaks another word.THEOForensic psychotherapist Theo Faber is convinced he can successfully treat Alicia, where all others have failed. Obsessed with investigating her crime, his discoveries suggest Alicia's silence goes far deeper than he first thought.And if she speaks, would he want to hear the truth?
characters: Alicia Berenson, Theo Faber, Kathy Faber, Professor Lazarus Diomedes, Gabe Berenson, Max Berenson, Christian West
